TopicTitle: What mod(s) can I find part(s) to do this?

Articles.Content:
I'm hoping someone can help me locate a part for my need/desire in the multitude of mods available.

I'm looking for a telescoping arm (minimum extension of 10m) that attaches radially to the craft and mounts flush. when activated, the part would pivot at the point attached to the craft by 90 degrees and extend. I should be able to attach other parts to the end of the arm from any direction.

If this part exists in any current mod(s) could you give me the name of the mod and the name of the part so I might find it easier.

Also, this does nto have to be a single part from a single mod. If multiple parts from the same or different mod can accomplish this, that will work.

Thanks in advance.
The obvious choice is Infernal Robotics, which lets you design your own robotic arms. There is also Romfarer's Robotic Arms Pack, which provides replicas of the CanadArm2 and the Buran manipulator.

The hinges look like they may meet my needs from Infernal Robotics (if I can figure out how to make them function), but I still need a telescoping arm that extends to AT LEAST 10m. Any ideas?

I am not in any position (technically or time wise) to create a part.

Edited February 6, 2015 by Menzoberranzan
IR has telescoping parts too, and you can resize them via TweakScale.

IR has telescoping parts too, and you can resize them via TweakScale.

With the length I'm looking for, the part would be a bit bigger in diameter than the 1.5m parts I want to attach them to.

I was looking over a great many mods and found that the magnetometer from DMagic Orbital Science would be perfect with a hinged base and ability to attach something to the end.
just attach 2 smaller part one on another
I wish to thank those that replied without reading/understanding the requirements, or completely ignoring those requirements because they feel they know better.

You sure know how to make people eager to answer your question.

There is no such part.

Begone.
